This is a fun game to play alone or with friends. If you like fast paced FPS games and don't mind the lack of realism, this is the game for you. The only issue is that there are quite a lot of hackers these days.

Great game, so many hours spent playing. Would highly recommend!

At this point in the game its unplayable every single person is toxic and or a tryhard that only hits headshots, i wish i could play more but its bad to play and get stressed out over something you cant improve on yourself. If they can rid the cheats maybe, and make the game fun again i would barely consider re-doing this. KK thats it
Играю на втором акке ! Я ютубер Игра топ!
The CS games are great. There is one (and only one) downside: cheats are incredibly easy to download and denial takes the place of enforcement.

You know when you would take a test you didnt study for in highschool and you felt like you made a passing grade, but it comes back to you the next day and you absolutely bombed it?

That's how every fire fight feels.  You go in lazy as fuck without looking into where to nade/pop flash/etc thinking you'll win, and you fail.

10/10 game would recommend since it's F2P and you can be hard stuck GN like me.
le meilleur jeux de tout les temps
